name: Saphira's Sands Escape
description:
Upcoming updates soon:

Tutorial level.

New abilities.

Online Scoreboard for the WebGL version.

Until there is a tutorial level here is some details:

Djinn will steal sand from inside the Hourglass (steals from top and bottom).

The collectable hourglass refills a portion of the sand.

The spinning arrows inverts upside down the hourglass.

Coins will increase your score.

All music, effects, art and code were done for the game jam.

Music & Effects: @FoxHoyde

Art: @Greytan

Game Programming: @miguelsgp
